name: RE: Rubik's
description:
Submission for Weekly Game Jam - Week 105

Rubik's cubes are too hard, so let's make them easy! Or so you thought.

[LEFT MOUSE] to select a colour and to paint a tile on the Rubik's cube. Click on the arrows to rotate the cube.

Leaving fresh paint on the bottom side of the Rubik's cube for too long will cause it to fall and force you to repaint that side, be careful!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

After a week of procrastination I managed to flush out something again ^^;

Same as always, I'd greatly appreciate all sorts of feedback!
